channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description:
Everytime I runserver this happens
[code]MaulsRus is now Online. Created by I Maul U Drp. Client type: high memory version UserId: 73816527 i maul u drp is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 23 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savechar(client.java:34142) at client.initialize(client.java:13775) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:209) at server.main(server.java:61)[/code]

item.title: Runserver error
